C

canAddCourse(Course) - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.course_manager.users.Student
Returns true if credits don't exceed Student's max credits AND the student isn't already enrolled into the course.
canAddCourse(Course) - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.course_manager.users.User
Returns true if the student can add the course to their schedule.
canEnroll(User) - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.course_manager.courses.Course
Returns true if there is capacity to add a user to the course and the user is not already enrolled.
canEnroll(User) - Method in interface edu.ncsu.csc216.course_manager.courses.Enrollable
Returns true if there is capacity to add a user to the course and the user is not already enrolled.
clearData() - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.course_manager.manager.CourseManager
Clears all course and student data from the Course manager without saving.
